title: entitydata
author: 840196733mw
txt_content: 用entitydata把一直叫qishi的僵尸改成骑僵尸马的有钻石剑的僵尸

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
entitydata无法改变Riding
请使用以下指令
/execute @e[type=Zombie,name=qishi] ~ ~ ~ summon Zombie ~ ~ ~ {Riding:{id:EntityHorse,Type:3,Tame:1},Equipment:[{id:276,Count:1},{},{},{},{}]}复制代码
然后使用
/tp @e[type=Zombie,name=qishi] ~ ~-9999 ~复制代码
把名字叫qishi的僵尸tp到虚空，这样就不会有kill的掉落物和死亡动画。
如果可以请给最佳

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content:
LZ很抱歉的告诉您，entitydata并无法改变Riding。若用entitydata改成有钻石剑的僵尸的话，可以用entitydata @e[type=Zombie,name=qishi] {Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:diamond_sword",Count:1b},{},{},{},{}]}复制代码
若想生成这样的僵尸，请使用summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {Riding:{id:EntityHorse,Type:3,Tame:1},Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:diamond_sword",Count:1b},{},{},{},{}]}复制代码

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 由于entitydata无法改变Riding，所以我们要这样做就要用另一种方法 先召唤一个骑僵尸马的有钻石剑的僵尸在僵尸的位置 /execute @e[type=Zombie,name=qishi] ~ ~ ~ summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {Riding:{id:EntityHorse,Type:3,Tame:1},Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:diamond_sword",Count:1b},{},{},{},{}]}复制代码然后kill僵尸 /kill @e[type=Zombie,name=qishi]复制代码即可

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2015-8-19 20:46
由于entitydata无法改变Riding，所以我们要这样做就要用另一种方法
先召唤一个骑僵尸马的有钻石剑的僵尸在 ...
又乱码了，真讨厌
/kill @e[type=Zombie,name=qishi]
